Package org.jetel.graph.runtime

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloverPost  
    CloverWorkerListener
    This interface describes a listener which listens to a CloverWorker and thus can react on worker finishing, either gracefully or abnormally
    FutureOfCallable<C extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<R>,R>
    This class is extension of regular Future class.
    FutureOfRunnable<T extends java.lang.Runnable>
    This class is extension of regular Future class.
    IThreadManager  
    WatchDogFuture
    WatchDogFuture class is a Future of a running WatchDog.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorityProxyDescription
    Description for AuthorityProxy extension point.
    AuthorityProxyFactory
    Factory for authority proxy extension point.
    CloverClassPath
    This class is only simple container for two list of classpath URLs. 1) Runtime classpath URLs should be used as an extra list of places where to search classes given direct in graph. 2) Compile classpath URLs should be used as an extra list of libraries which should be part of -classpath in compile time for java source given direct in graph.
    CloverWorker
    This implementation of Runnable interface should be use for each thread inside a component.
    CloverWorkerListener.Event
    An event class carries all information needed when an CloverWorker talks to its listeners
    EngineInitializer
    Clover.ETL engine initializer.
    ErrorMsgBody  
    GraphRuntimeContext
    Common used implementation of IGraphRuntimeContext interface.
    GraphTrackingLogger
    Console logger of all tracking information.
    IAuthorityProxy  
    IAuthorityProxy.FileOperationResult  
    IAuthorityProxy.RemoteEdgeDataSource
    This class represents data source of a remote edge - pair of input stream and runId of remote job.
    IAuthorityProxy.RemoteEdgeDataTarget
    This class represents data target of a remote edge - pair of output stream and runId of remote job.
    IAuthorityProxy.RunStatus  
    JobflowTrackingLogger
    Console logger of all tracking information.
    Message<T>  
    PrimitiveAuthorityProxy  
    SimpleThreadManager  
    SingleThreadWatchDog
    Alternative implementation of WatchDog.
    TempSpace
    TempSpace is a directory where temp files are stored.
    TrackingLogger
    Console logger of all tracking information.
    WatchDog
    Description of the Class
